actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 with respect to the treatment of interest paid in connection with certain life insurance contracts.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to disallow a deduction for excess interest paid in connection with certain life insurance contracts. Modifies provisions with respect to indebtedness under such contracts.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 with respect to the treatment of interest paid in connection with certain life insurance contracts.
